message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $12000 to us, reflecting its unique features, quality, and the expertise poured into its creation. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Would you be interested in acquiring this product at a special introductory price of $10000? This opportunity is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Please let me know your thoughts, and we can proceed with the transaction.
